oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Army of the Republic commemorative spoon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gold-washed spoon commemorating the Grand Army of the Republic (G. A. R.) reunion in Louisville, Kentucky. The handle of the spoon is comprised of a uniformed Grand Army of the Republic soldier with rifle. The bowl of the spoon is engraved with an eagle, "GAR" in decorative lettering, and "Louisville 1895."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
